content: after round 6 90 sts total 45 sts per needle 2 ribbed collar abbreviations k = knit work in k2 p1 ribbing in the round for 14 cm p = purl kfb = knit into front and back of same stitch this creates a stretchy flexible neck that hugs the bottle opening ssk = slip slip knit k2tog = knit 2 together then work 1 round of k1 p1 ribbing sts = stitches bind off all stitches using the italian bind- round s = round s off method for a neat stretchy edge reference finishing three-color stranded knitting video link fold the ribbed collar inward toward the wrong side to double it for a tidy finish https //www youtube com/watch v=s3gbuxqu8g8 weave in all ends securely optional lightly steam or wet block the contact me cover to even out stitches and help the colorwork relax if you have any questions please feel free to email me seasonknits@qq com 小红书 rednot season今晚不通宵 finishing notes slip your hot water bottle into the cover fold the doubled collar neatly inward for a polished look embroider any additional details e g yellow windows at this stage if desired congratulations you ve finished your cosy hot water bottle sweater stay warm and enjoy 3 4
